column1:
function csv_to_array($filename='', $delimiter=';')
        {
    	if(!file_exists($filename) || !is_readable($filename))
    		return FALSE;
    
    	$header = NULL;
    	$data = array();
    	if (($handle = fopen($filename, 'r')) !== FALSE)
    	{
    		while (($row = fgetcsv($handle, 1000, $delimiter)) !== FALSE)
    		{
    			if(!$header)
    				$header = $row;
    			else
    				$data[] = array_combine($header, $row);
    		}
    		fclose($handle);
    	}
    	return $data;
    }
